name: Standard Industrial Quote
description: Standard template for industrial equipment quotations
terms: Payment within 30 days, 50% advance required. Delivery within 4-6 weeks. Warranty: 1 year on parts and labor.

name: Automation Project Quote
description: Specialized template for automation and control systems
terms: Payment: 40% advance, 30% on delivery, 30% on completion. Project timeline: 8-12 weeks. Warranty: 2 years comprehensive.

name: Bulk Order Quote
description: Template for bulk orders and volume discounts
terms: Payment within 15 days for 5% discount. Bulk pricing applies for orders over 10 units. Delivery: 2-3 weeks.

name: Custom Fabrication Quote
terms: Payment: 30% advance, 40% on material procurement, 30% on completion. Custom designs require approval. Timeline: 6-8 weeks.

name: Emergency Service Quote
description: Template for urgent repair and service work
terms: Payment: 100% advance for emergency services. 24-48 hour response time. Premium rates apply for urgent work.
